Project Proponent: Newton, Robert Lindsay, and Newton, Marie Therese
Method: Carbon Credits (Carbon Farming Initiative - Avoided Deforestation 1.1) Methodology Determination 2015
Project Description: This project protects the native forest from being deforested (cleared) and the land from being converted to an agricultural system, where a clearing permit was issued before 1 July 2010.
Project Area(s), where the project is an:
4343/DP768387, 5425/DP768336, 5430/DP768341, 5863/DP768341, 669/DP761711, 5477/DP768387, 2260/DP764026



This project is in the Brewarrina local government area.
Is the project area or project areas sub: There is no carbon maintenance obligation on this project area
